metadata.Title: CVE-2018-11529 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: VideoLAN VLC media player 2.2.x is prone to a use after free vulnerabilitywhich an attacker can leverage to execute arbitrary code via crafted MKVfiles. Failed exploit attempts will likely result in denial of serviceconditions.

criterions.comment: vlc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
